name: zendframework/zend-cache
description: provides a generic way to cache any data

suggest.ext-apc: APC or compatible extension, to use the APC storage adapter
suggest.ext-apcu: APCU >= 5.1.0, to use the APCu storage adapter
suggest.ext-dba: DBA, to use the DBA storage adapter
suggest.ext-memcache: Memcache >= 2.0.0 to use the Memcache storage adapter
suggest.ext-memcached: Memcached >= 1.0.0 to use the Memcached storage adapter
suggest.ext-mongo: Mongo, to use MongoDb storage adapter
suggest.ext-redis: Redis, to use Redis storage adapter
suggest.ext-wincache: WinCache, to use the WinCache storage adapter
suggest.ext-xcache: XCache, to use the XCache storage adapter
suggest.mongofill/mongofill: Alternative to ext-mongo - a pure PHP implementation designed as a drop in replacement
